question: Who has been appointed as the new Union Law Secretary?
explanation: Anoop Kumar Mendiratta has been appointed as the new Law Secretary (Secretary, Legal Affairs) in the Union Law Ministry on contractual basis till March 30, 2023. He  is at present the District and Sessions Judge (North East) of the Delhi\'s Karkardooma Courts.  As per officials, it is the first time a sitting judge has been appointed as Law Secretary.
